description: Try our easy to follow One Pan Lamb & Sautéed Veg recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb dishes,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Mushroom,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: One Pan Lamb & Sautéed Veg Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes as per packet instructions for 6 minutes or until just tender. Cool for 2 minutes, open bag and halve potatoes.

Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Add potatoes and onion and cook for about 5 minutes or until beginning to brown. Add mushrooms, mustard and thyme and cook, stirring occasionally, for a further 10 minutes, or until potatoes and mushrooms are golden. Add lemon juice and spinach and remove from heat. Transfer to a bowl and keep warm.

Season lamb and drizzle with extra oil. Heat frying pan over medium heat, add lamb and cook for 2-3 minutes each side for medium rare. Rest for a few minutes before serving with vegetables and lemon wedges.
